put.description: Creates a new CatDog with the specified parameters.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the CatDog to create.

200.description: The operation was successful. The response contains the CatDog entity.

202.description: The operation will be completed asynchronously.

Location.description: The URL of the resource used to check the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: Suggested delay to check the status of the asynchronous operation. The value is an integer that represents the seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all CatDogs registered to owner with name ownerName.

200.description: The operation was successful. The response contains a list of CatDog entities associated with the owner.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new CatDog with the specified parameters.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the CatDog to create.

200.description: The operation was successful. The response contains the CatDog entity.

202.description: The operation will be completed asynchronously.

Location.description: The URL of the resource used to check the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: Suggested delay to check the status of the asynchronous operation. The value is an integer that represents the seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all CatDogs with matching parameters.

parameters.name: secretAgentName
parameters.description: CatDog's secret agent name. Don't tell anyone.

parameters.name: isSecretAgent
parameters.description: Whether or not CatDog is a secret agent.

parameters.name: scoreAdjustedForInflation
parameters.description: CatDog's score, adjusted for score inflation.

200.description: The operation was successful. The response contains a list of CatDog entities matching parameters.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

storageAccountId.description: The resource ID of the storage account to be used for auto storage account.

AutoStorageBaseProperties.description: The properties related to auto storage account.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: A unique identifier of a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to be used with the HTTP request.
